DOC.criteria: To eligible unlicensed umbilical cord blood ( UCB ) unit , subject must meet eligibility criterion list : Subjects diagnosis institutional review board ( IRB ) approve treatment protocol require UCB source hematopoietic stem cell lympho‐hematopoietic reconstitution myeloablative non myeloablative conditioning .
